name: You Have No Control Here
description:
In this 2D-endless runner game you partially control a square and you goal is to see how far you can travel, The catch is that the square wants to dye so it will periodically try to stop you.

The square will sometimes take control and do some random staff like flipping gravity and and the controls and jumping on its own(usually towards traps) in an attempt to end itself

------------------------------------

controls

-----------------------------------

A/D or left/right: to move

space to jump
